text: Steve Dodd (1 June 1928 - 10 November 2014) was an Australian actor and stockman. He was known for his roles in Gallipoli, The Coca-Cola Kid, Quigley Down Under and The Matrix. Dodd died in Basin View, New South Wales, Australia, aged 86. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Australian movie actors
title: Steve Dodd
